titles.title: Public Safety Officers' Benefits Fairness Act
To amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to allow personnel at correctional facilities to qualify to receive certain benefits.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2323-2324)
Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice.

bill.summary: 9/30/1993--Introduced. Public Safety Officers' Benefits Fairness Act - Amends the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to entitle personnel at correctional facilities to certain benefits provided for law enforcement officers under the Act.
